metadata.name: Superblue v.3
metadata.description:
Krista Kim in collaboration with Efrén Mur with music by Ligovskoï.
“Superblue v.3" is a digital meditation experience that uses visual guides and healing sound frequencies to create a meditative state. Superblue was created with the intention of providing a digital Zen experience for digital natives.

Credit: Krista Kim in collaboration with Efren Mur, music by Ligovskoi.
